detail_desc: Short, fitted, sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with decorative crossover straps at the front and triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with decorative crossover straps at the front and triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton seersucker with an open, wrapover back with a concealed fastening at the top and ties at the hem. Long sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton seersucker with an open, wrapover back with a concealed fastening at the top and ties at the hem. Long sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with sequined panels on the sleeves. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Pile jacket with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and kangaroo pockets. Ribbed trims around the pockets and cuffs.
Pile jacket with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and kangaroo pockets. Ribbed trims around the pockets and cuffs.
Jacket in patterned, lightweight stretch twill with a collar and press-studs down the front. Fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. No lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. No lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and an unlined hood with a decorative drawstring. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and an unlined hood with a decorative drawstring. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in patterned cotton twill with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front and a chin guard at the top. Flap chest pocket with press-studs and front pockets with a taped zip. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the legs and back, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front and a chin guard at the top. Flap chest pocket with press-studs and front pockets with a taped zip. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the legs and back, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Wide-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying mesh. Racer back with a cut-out section and narrow elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Fully lined, print-patterned bikinis. Tops with narrow shoulder straps, a frill trim at the top and decorative bows at the front. Matching bikini bottoms.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.
Fully lined print-patterned swimsuits with a flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps. One of the swimsuits also has decorative bows.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Double narrow shoulder straps, a mesh section at the back and wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
